articles.description: Real Madrid forward Luka Jovic will return to the Bundesliga side Eintracht Frankfurt in a hope to revive his career - having scored 27 goals in 48 appearances during the 2018-2019 campaign.
articles.content:
Real Madrid forward Luka Jovic has agreed a deal to re-join Eintracht Frankfurt on a loan deal for the remainder of the 2020-2021 season.
Jovic will return to the Bundesliga side in a hope to revive… [+1354 chars]

articles.description: Juddmonte announced the death of His Highness Prince Khalid bin Abdullah on January 12. His colours were carried to victory by over 500 stakes winners
articles.content:
